    Reference

    All functions

    ECx_rating()

    Title

    ED(<plus>)

    Calculating ED following the regulatrory ED definition.

    RSCABK()

    Runs the kth slice of RSCABS

    Tarone.test()

    Tarone's Z Test

    addECxCI()

    adding ECx estimation and interval to the model output plot

    calcNW()

    Title

    calcSteepnessOverlap()

    Title

    calcTaronesTest()

    Tarones test for Stratified OR (taken from https://github.com/the8thday/ClinStats/blob/master/R/Tarones.R)

    calpha.test()

    C(alpha) test from the epiphy package.

    contEndpoint()

    get Endpoint for continuous data

    drcCompare()

    Compare models with multiple criteria

    getEndpoint()

    getEndpoint according to a series of p-values

    getModelName()

    Get Model Name

    getwilliamRes()

    get from william res accept/reject

    invlogxp()

    inverse transformation of logxp

    logxp()

    Helper function for scaling x-axis

    monotonicityTest()

    Testing Monotonicity

    mselect.ED()

    Select ECx estimation from Models with mselect.plus and EFSA SO criteria

    mselect.plus()

    added functionality for mselect

    plot(<edList>)

    Plot the ECx estimation and confidence intervals from the list of models.

    plot(<modList>)

    Plot a list of models together.

    prepDataRSCABS()

    Prepares data for an RSCABS analysis

    reshape_drcData()

    Reshape the wide data to long data

    runRSCABS()

    Run RSCABS test

    simplifyTreatment()

    Resolve the excel datasheet number issue like 12.300000000000001 or 8.3579999999999

    stepDownRSCABS()

    Performs the step down aspect of RSCABS

    stepKRSCABS()

    plotRSCABS

    summaryZG()

    Summary Williams Test results.

    treatment2dose()

    Change Treatment groups to numerical dose

    wide2long()

    change from wide format to long format

    williamsTest_JG()

    Williams Test from the StatCharrms Package
